description: Graphs the columns of a *.1D time series file to the X11 screen, or to an image file (.jpg or .png).

tsfiles.title: Time Series Files
tsfiles.description: Input time series files (*.1D) to be plotted.

sep.title: Separate Sub-Graphs
sep.description: Plot each column in a separate sub-graph.

one.title: One Big Graph
one.description: Plot all columns together in one big graph.

sepscl.title: Separate Sub-Graphs with different y-scale
sepscl.description: Plot each column in a separate sub-graph and allow each sub-graph to have a different y-scale. This option is meaningless with -one!

NOLINE.title: No Connecting Lines with Axis Containment
NOLINE.description: Same as -noline, but will not try to plot values outside the rectangular box that contains the graph axes.

box.title: Plot Boxes
box.description: Plot a small 'box' at each data point.

hist.title: Histogram Style
hist.description: Plot graphs in histogram style (i.e., vertical boxes).

norm2.title: L2 Norm Scaling
norm2.description: Independently scale each time series plotted to have L_2 norm = 1 (sum of squares).

normx.title: Linfinity Norm Scaling
normx.description: Independently scale each time series plotted to have max absolute value = 1 (L_infinity norm).

norm1.title: L1 Norm Scaling
norm1.description: Independently scale each time series plotted to have max sum of absolute values = 1 (L_1 norm).

demean.title: Demean Time Series
demean.description: Remove the mean from each time series before normalizing.

x.title: X axis data
x.description: Use for X axis the data in a specified .1D file.

xl10.title: Log10 X axis data
xl10.description: Use log10 of the specified .1D file as the X axis.

dx.title: X-axis spacing
dx.description: Spacing between points on the x-axis.

ignore.title: Ignore Initial Rows
ignore.description: Skip first 'nn' rows in the input file.

ylabel.title: Y-axis Label
ylabel.description: Put string 'aa' to the left of the y-axis.

title.title: Plot Title
title.description: Same as -plabel, but only works with -ps/-png/-jpg/-pnm options.

wintitle.title: Window Title
wintitle.description: Set string 'pp' as the title of the frame containing the plot.

naked.title: Naked Graph
naked.description: Do NOT plot axes or labels, just the graph(s).

aspect.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect.description: Set the width-to-height ratio of the plot region to 'A'.

stdin.title: Read from Stdin
stdin.description: Don't read from tsfile; instead, read from stdin and plot it.

ps.title: PostScript Output
ps.description: Don't draw plot in a window; instead, write it to stdout in PostScript format.

jpg.title: JPEG Output
jpg.description: Render plot to JPEG image and save to a file named 'fname'.

jpeg.title: JPEG Output
jpeg.description: Render plot to JPEG image and save to a file named 'fname'.

png.title: PNG Output
png.description: Render plot to PNG image and save to a file named 'fname'.

pnm.title: PNM Output
pnm.description: Render plot to PNM image and save to a file named 'fname'.

pngs.title: PNG Output with Size
pngs.description: Render plot to PNG image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.

jpgs.title: JPEG Output with Size
jpgs.description: Render plot to JPEG image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.

jpegs.title: JPEG Output with Size
jpegs.description: Render plot to JPEG image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.

pnms.title: PNM Output with Size
pnms.description: Render plot to PNM image of specified size and save to a file named 'fname'.

ytran.title: Y-axis Transformation
ytran.description: Transform the data along the y-axis by applying the expression to each input value.

xtran.title: X-axis Transformation
xtran.description: Transform the data along the x-axis by applying the expression to each input value.

xaxis.title: X-axis Settings
xaxis.description: Set the x-axis to run from value 'b' to value 't', with 'n' major divisions and 'm' minor tic marks per major division.

yaxis.title: Y-axis Settings
yaxis.description: Set the y-axis to run from value 'b' to value 't', with 'n' major divisions and 'm' minor tic marks per major division.

ynames.title: Y-axis Names
ynames.description: Use the strings as labels to the right of the graphs, corresponding to each input column.

volreg.title: Volume Registration Names
volreg.description: Makes the 'ynames' be the same as the 6 labels used in plug_volreg for Roll, Pitch, Yaw, I-S, R-L, and A-P movements.

thick.title: Increase Line Thickness
thick.description: Increase the line thickness used for plotting.

THICK.title: Double Line Thickness
THICK.description: Twice the power of '-thick' at no extra cost!

anyOf.description: Increase the line thickness used for plotting.

thick.description: Increase the line thickness used for plotting.

dashed.title: Dashed Lines
dashed.description: Plot dashed lines between data points using specified colon-separated list of dash values (1: solid, 2: longer dashes, 3: shorter dashes).

setenv.title: Set Environment Variable
setenv.description: Set environment variable 'name' to 'val' for this run of the program only.

censor_RGB.title: Censor Marking Color
censor_RGB.description: Set the color used for marking to a specified color.

censor.title: Censor Time Series
censor.description: Specify the filename of the censor .1D time series.

CENSORTR.title: Censor Time Indexes
CENSORTR.description: Specify time indexes to be marked in the graph(s).

concat.title: Concatenated Runs
concat.description: Specify the filename for the list of concatenated runs.

rbox.title: Draw Rectangular Box
rbox.description: Draw a rectangular box with specified corners and colors.

Rbox.title: Draw Rectangular Box with Line
Rbox.description: Draw a rectangular box with one extra horizontal line.
